DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see whether patients triggered with only human Chorion Gonadotropin (hCG) have higher number of Metaphase II oocytes (MII) and implantation rate than patients triggered with hCG combined with Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone (GnRH) agonist.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing hCG Triggering Versus hCG Associated With GnRH Agonist
DOC.criteria: Intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI) patients below 38 years 1,2 or 3 rd IVFcycle polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) patients patients with endocrinological diseases or problems
